Container.Name: orderworks
Container.Overview:
OrderWorks ingests MakerWorks fabrication jobs, stores them in PostgreSQL, and surfaces an admin UI for completing work.

Deploy this container alongside a PostgreSQL database. Supply the DATABASE_URL connection string and a MAKERWORKS_WEBHOOK_SECRET so MakerWorks webhook calls can be validated. Optional email settings enable completion receipts.

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: Container port exposed by the Next.js server

Config.Name: MakerWorks Webhook Secret
Config.Description: Shared secret MakerWorks uses when POSTing jobs

Config.Name: Admin Username
Config.Description: Username required to log into the admin dashboard

Config.Name: Admin Password
Config.Description: Password required to log into the admin dashboard

Config.Name: Admin Session Secret
Config.Description: Secret used to sign admin session cookies (rotate to force logouts)

Config.Name: Resend API Key
Config.Description: Optional Resend API key used to send completion emails

Config.Name: Receipt From Email
Config.Description: Friendly from line used on completion email receipts

Config.Name: Receipt Reply Email
Config.Description: Optional reply-to address for receipt emails

Config.Name: SMTP Host
Config.Description: SMTP host (set along with SMTP_* settings if not using Resend)

Config.Name: SMTP Secure
Config.Description: Set to true only if your SMTP server requires implicit TLS

Config.Name: Skip DB Migrate
Config.Description: Set to 1 to prevent the container from running Prisma migrations on start
